Video quality sucks -- the display ratio is wrong. Don't bother downloading, it's a waste of time.

It is worth noting that this file has got the aspect ratio wrong. For some reason it is encoded in a 11:9 format, though it should be 16:9. However, if I just run it in mplayer with "-aspect 16:9", then it works perfectly and the quality is very good given the resolution and file size. At least it isn't a camjob.
